contexts.context: ..., 2 - 3 rooms with nice furniture, <mark>carpets</mark> and rugs as well as several other things....
..., he could ruin the chairs, soil the <mark>carpets</mark>. Later, when a daughter has grown up,...
...and velvet for clothes, French linen, English <mark>carpets</mark>, slates, canvases, weaving and garnishes....
...and garnishes. A particularly big selection of English <mark>carpets</mark>, airy portiers, lace curtains, sheep wool...
...the London market strongly, called him on the <mark>carpet</mark> and the American tycoon was forced to break it...
